lead_paragraph: KING--Katherine Rees. The members and candidates of the Contemporary Freudian Society (formerly the New York Freudian Society) are deeply saddened by the passing of Katherine Rees King, our esteemed and cherished colleague and friend. A highly skilled and deeply compassionate psychoanalyst, Kay mentored, taught and guided many generations of students and figured crucially in the founding of our child psychoanalysis program. It was a great pleasure and a singular privilege to know Kay, work with her, learn from her, and laugh with her. A person of sharp intellect, infinite kindness and refreshing English wit, she is deeply missed. We send our condolences to her husband Charles and her brothers Tony and Alan. A memorial service will be held on Sunday, April 3, 11am-1pm, at the John Krtil Funeral Home, 1297 First Ave. (between 69th and 70th Streets). 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KING, KATHERINE REES
